653: Job Description The Role: The primary purpose of this position is to respond to high-threat situations such as an active shooter or terrorist attack by employing tactical teamwork and the use of force necessary to protect the public and contain or resolve the incident. The position reports to the Tactical Response Team Lead and operations are based out of the GM Headquarters (Renaissance Center) located in Detroit, MI. Responsibilities: Respond to incidents involving an active shooter, violent or mentally ill subjects, medical situations, bomb threats and/or any other event in accordance with General Motors Global Security standards Preserve order and enforce regulations and directives pertaining to the site, personnel and visitors Assure compliance with applicable sections of the General Motors Global Security Manual and Standard Operating Procedures Conduct foot or vehicle patrols to ensure a safe and secure work environment Observe, report and manage activities and incidents at assigned General Motors sites Protect property owned by General Motors, occupying tenants and site visitors Control access to General Motors facilities through the admittance process Monitor site entrances and exits; act to prevent unauthorized entry; control the movement of people and vehicles Protect evidence and/or the scene of a crime, incident or accident Prepare incident reports, daily logs, etc., as required by General Motors Global Security standards Conduct physical/personal security operations at off-site locations Monitor remote areas using closed circuit television and operates remote devices Project a courteous and professional demeanor when interacting with General Motors personnel, visitors and the public Additional Job Description Knowledge: Working knowledge of processes related to security such as: emergency response and crisis management security technology Working knowledge of law enforcement specifically relating to arrest powers (PA330) Working knowledge of the Use-of-Force Continuum Firearms training Skills: Ability to maintain a high degree of professionalism and a constant state of vigilance Ability to learn security operations and procedures Be an effective team member and carry out instructions Maintain professional composure when dealing with unusual circumstances Verbal and written communication skills Physically respond to all emergency situations and act in a decisive manner Interact effectively at all levels and across diverse cultures Use less than lethal means Ability to work various shifts Experience/Education: High school diploma or equivalent experience Preferred - Bachelor's degree from an accredited university, college or equivalent formal education Must be a current or former U.S. law enforcement officer (sworn or PA330) with a minimum of five years of experience Served on a tactical team. (preferred) Must pass a criminal history check, background investigation, psychological testing, medical screening, and drug testing Must be physically able to pass an annual fitness test Must qualify with a handgun, shotgun and tactical carbine regularly Maintains a Concealed Pistol License (CPL) Maintains any applicable licensing requirements for security officers Maintains basic first aid and CPR certifications PA330 Certified (preferred) Emergency Medical Technician (preferred) Competencies: Dealing with ambiguity Functional/technical skills Timely decision making Mission focus Conflict management Command skills Composure Action oriented Integrity and trust Compensation: The expected base compensation for this role is: ($49,066-$72,520). Actual base compensation within the identified range will vary based on factors relevant to the position. Bonus Potential: An incentive pay program offers payouts based on company performance, job level, and individual performance. Benefit options include medical, dental, vision, Health Savings Account, Flexible Spending Accounts, retirement savings plan, sickness and accident benefits, life insurance, paid vacation & holidays, tuition assistance programs, employee assistance program, GM vehicle discounts and more.
